samba:parameter.name: server services

description.para: This option contains the services that the Samba daemon will run.
An entry in the smb.conf file can either override the previous value completely or entries can be removed from or added to it by prefixing them with + or -.

samba:parameter.value: s3fs, rpc, nbt, wrepl, ldap, cldap, kdc, drepl, winbindd, ntp_signd, kcc, dnsupdate, dns
